problems.description: Nonlinear Error Amplification: Errors grow superlinearly.
Learning Option Valuation: Value learning paths that expire.
Stable Learning Equilibrium: Reach stable adaptive equilibrium.
Learning Cliff Avoidance: Avoid irreversible learning cliffs.
Endgame Knowledge Reserves: Preserve knowledge for final phase.
Pattern Lock-In: One learned pattern dominates permanently.
Learning Debt Restructuring: Resolve accumulated learning debt.
Stability Basin Steering: Steer learning into stable basin.
Delayed Error Explosion: Suppressed errors explode late.
Formal Learning Proof: Prove stability and safety.
Learning Hedge Portfolio: Hedge against harmful learning.
Learning Reinvestment: Reinvest effort to restore quality.
Error Shock Propagation: Error propagates across modules.
Endgame Learning Constraints: Final constraints bind early updates.
